        Parameters:

        enrollment - assigned value

        public Set<Enrollment> getEnrollments()

      • getEnrollmentWeight

        public double getEnrollmentWeight(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                                  Request excludeRequest)
        Enrollment weight -- weight of all requests which have an enrollment that is of this request group, excluding the given one. See Request.getWeight().
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        excludeRequest - course request to ignore, if any
        Returns:
        enrollment weight

      • getSectionWeight

        public double getSectionWeight(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                               Section section,
                               Request excludeRequest)
        Section weight -- weight of all requests which have an enrollment that is of this request group and that includes the given section, excluding the given one. See Request.getWeight().
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        section - section in question
        excludeRequest - course request to ignore, if any
        Returns:
        enrollment weight

      • getEnrollmentSpread

        public double getEnrollmentSpread(Assignment<Request,Enrollment> assignment,
                                  Enrollment enrollment,
                                  double bestRatio,
                                  double fillRatio)
        Return how much is the given enrollment (which is not part of the request group) creating an issue for this request group
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        enrollment - enrollment in question
        bestRatio - how much of the weight should be used on estimation of the enrollment potential (considering that students of this group that are not yet enrolled can take the same enrollment)
        fillRatio - how much of the weight should be used in estimation how well are the sections of this enrollments going to be filled (bestRatio + fillRatio <= 1.0)
        Returns:
        1.0 if all enrollments have the same sections as the given one, 0.0 if there is no match at all

      • getAverageSpread

        public double getAverageSpread()
        Return average section spread of this group. It reflects the probability of two students of this group being enrolled in the same section.
        Returns:
        1.0 if all enrollments have the same sections as the given one, 0.0 if there is no match at all

      • getSectionSpread

        public double getSectionSpread(Section section)
        Return section spread of this group. It reflects the probability of two students of this group being enrolled in this section.
        Parameters:
        section - given section
        Returns:
        1.0 if all enrollments have the same sections as the given one, 0.0 if there is no match at all
